definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: collection (cf. Ph. [[אספת]] assembly) only [[בַּעֲלֵי אֲסֻפּוֹת]] Ec 12:11 ([[דִּבְרֵי חֲכָמִים]]) compared to driven nails; members of learned assemblies Thes MV al.; so postB. Heb. NHWB:i. 127; but Hitz-Now al. refer to the wise utterances, called lords (possessors) of collection because of their well-connected grouping.
